name: PingOne Advanced Identity Cloud
description: Test your knowledge of PingOne's advanced features

questions.question: What protocol is used for federated authentication in PingOne?
questions.explanation: OIDC (OpenID Connect) is the primary protocol used in PingOne for federated authentication as it provides a modern, REST-based protocol built on OAuth 2.0.
